articles.title: Man found guilty of raping teenage girl at Rockland migrant shelter in 2024
articles.description:
The man was convicted on one count of child rape aggravated by an age gap of 10 years or more, according to court records.

The post Man found guilty of raping teenage girl at Rockland migrant shelter in 2024 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Man found guilty of raping teenage girl at Rocklan

Details:

The man was convicted on one count of child rap
